Uses of Class
org.tensorflow.EagerSession.Options

Packages that use EagerSession.Options
Package
Description
org.tensorflow
Defines classes to build, save, load and execute TensorFlow models.

  • Uses of EagerSession.Options in org.tensorflow

    Methods in org.tensorflow that return EagerSession.Options
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    EagerSession.Options
    EagerSession.Options.async(boolean value)
    Controls how operations dispatched are actually executed.
    EagerSession.Options
    EagerSession.Options.config(ConfigProto config)
    Configures the session based on the data found in the provided configuration.
    EagerSession.Options
    EagerSession.Options.devicePlacementPolicy(EagerSession.DevicePlacementPolicy value)
    Controls how to act when we try to run an operation on a given device but some input tensors are not on that device.
    static EagerSession.Options
    EagerSession.options()
    Returns an object that configures and builds a EagerSession with custom options.
    Methods in org.tensorflow with parameters of type EagerSession.Options
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static EagerSession
    EagerSession.initDefault(EagerSession.Options options)
    Initializes the default eager session, which remains active for the lifetime of the application.
